Harry Styles Ungkap Alasan Tolak Peran di The Little Mermaid
04 Nov 2019, 13:56 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Harry Styles memilih mendahulukan karier bermusik daripada menjadi Prince Eric dalam 'The Little Mermaid'. (dok. Emma McIntyre/Getty Images for SiriusXM/AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Penyanyi solo Harry Styles menuturkan alasan menolak peran Prince Eric dalam film live-action The Little Mermaid. Ia sudah tak lagi menjadi kandidat pemeran Prince Eric sejak Agustus lalu.Alasan itu ia ungkap dalam wawancara dengan Capital FM. Styles menjelaskan sempat bertemu dengan sutradara Rob Marshall sebelum kabar ia sebagai kandidat pemeran Prince Eric bocor ke media.Menurutnya, ada beberapa hal yang tidak dapat mereka berdua selesaikan. Styles juga menjelaskan bahwa ke depannya, ia memiliki jadwal bermusik yang tidak cocok dengan jadwal produksi film."Saya rasa itu jelas akan menjadi film yang luar biasa. Tapi mereka syuting terlalu lama dan saya ingin tur tahun depan, mungkin," kata Styles.



Pada Juli lalu, Styles menjadi kandidat pemeran Prince Eric ketika pihak studio menjelaskan tengah dalam tahap negosiasi. Sebelumnya, selain Styles, aktor Noah Centino juga disebut sebagai salah satu kandidat.Cerita The Little Mermaid versi live-action disebut masih akan seperti versi yang rilis pada 1989. Seorang putri duyung remaja bernama Ariel telah lama bermimpi untuk hidup menjadi manusia.Ia lantas bertemu dengan penyihir bernama Ursula yang berjanji bisa mengubahnya jadi manusia yang memiliki dua kaki, bukannya sirip. Namun sebagai gantinya, Ursula meminta suara Ariel yang merdu.Setelah menjadi manusia, Ariel bertemu dengan Pangeran Eric. Ia jatuh cinta dan ingin menikahinya, tapi mimpi itu tidak mudah dicapai karena banyak masalah yang harus dilewati. (adp/rea)

Harry Styles Reveals Reason for Rejecting the Role in The Little Mermaid
Nov 04 2019, 13:56 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Harry Styles chose to put his musical career first instead of becoming Prince Eric in 'The Little Mermaid'. (doc. Emma McIntyre / Getty Images for SiriusXM / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Solo singer Harry Styles said the reason for rejecting the role of Prince Eric in the live-action film The Little Mermaid. He is no longer a candidate for the role of Prince Eric since last August. That reason he revealed in an interview with Capital FM. Styles explained that he had met with director Rob Marshall before the news he was as a candidate for the role of Prince Eric was leaked to the media. According to him, there were some things that they both could not finish. Styles also explained that going forward, he has a music schedule that does not fit into the film production schedule.



In July, Styles became a candidate for the role of Prince Eric when the studio explained it was in the negotiation stage. Previously, in addition to Styles, actor Noah Centino was also referred to as one of the candidates. The story of The Little Mermaid live-action version was said to be still like the version that was released in 1989. A teenage mermaid named Ariel had long dreamed of living as a human. She then met with a witch named Ursula who promised to turn her into a human with two legs instead of fins. But instead, Ursula asked Ariel's sweet voice. After becoming a human, Ariel met with Prince Eric. He fell in love and wanted to marry her, but the dream was not easy to achieve because of many problems that had to be overcome. (adp / rea)
